general_info.summary: The provided text is a URL pointing to the MBA Dual Specialization program page on the Sharda University website.

career_path.summary: This course prepares students for management roles such as Marketing Managers and Sales Managers. Graduates can expect an average annual salary package ranging from 3.52 LPA to 9.60 LPA and are often recruited by various companies. The program encourages individuals to pursue a career in management.
career_path.raw_content:
Career path you can choose after the course
• Marketing Managers
• Sales Managers
Students of this programme are placed in companies with an average annual package of 3.52 LPA to 9.60 LPA
Take the next step towards a career in management.
• Recruiters
